songs.title: This One’s For Me
songs.lyrics:
[Harmonizing Intro: Francesca Simone]

[Verse: Francesca Simone & Keyon Christ]
Kept it on the hush, real ones keep it silently
Nonstop, this shit sleep-depriving me
Finally, I can get some privacy
Rightfully, I just needed time for me (I just needed time for me)
I'm too busy pleasing everybody except myself
Too busy helping everybody, couldn't help myself

[Chorus]
This one's for me
This one's for me

[Harmonizing Outro: Francesca Simone]
